Reviews.Title: problems with two cameras
Reviews.Author: C. Worthy
Reviews.Content: This camera worked only briefly before freezing -- it would do nothing at all and would not even turn on, despite trying different batteries. Amazon exchanged it for the same model, at our request, and we had the same experience with that one as well. Please check out other online reviews for this camera before puchasing it. This has happened to other buyers. On a postive note, Amazon's customer service continues to impress.

Reviews.Title: EASY FOR ANYONE
Reviews.Author: Greg Kukanich "krunchnik"
Reviews.Content: We bought this camera for my wife to use,she doesn't like buttons and whistle's,this is a good pick for her,just the top lever to pick between still images and video,that's all she says she will use.It takes really good pictures on auto and the videos are not to bad either,just twist the lever to video mode and push the shutter button to start recording and push again to stop.She likes it and that's all that matters.Just be carefull when you first get the camera and install the batteries it is real easy to put them in backwards,the way the camera is marked fools you.Also the SD card slot is by the batteries makes it kind of difficult if you have clumsy fingers.Also just to point out that when you play the video back on the camera you will not hear the audio,their is no built in speaker so you will have to view it on your PC for the sound.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for a great price!!
Reviews.Author: T. Hinkle
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera for the money! I am no photography expert, so all I needed  was a simple camera that takes great pictures! Very easy to operate, has nice features, and comes from a well known photo company: Kodak. Highly recommend !!

Reviews.Title: Easy as Pie
Reviews.Author: Grandma Mac "Grandma Mac"
Reviews.Content: This is my first Digital camera so I wanted something easy. My grandson recommeded this one for me.  Now I can take pictures and videos and it is so much fun. Kodak has always been a leader in the field and I have not been disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: R. Howell-Sang
Reviews.Content: This camera takes great pictures.My daughter was able to set up the camera in less than 5 minutes.It was very easy to use and I have had no  problems so far.

Reviews.Title: Cheap and Pleased
Reviews.Author: E. Wolfe
Reviews.Content: I purchased the C713 refurbished as a gift for my father who is classically unfamiliar with electronic gadgets, but a lifelong though intermittent photographer.  The on-screen descriptions of each mode make it easy for a digital camera novice to explore the functions and features available.  It functions reliably and takes great pictures, though it is a bit slow to recover after taking a flash shot.  During the lag, the most recent picture taken is displayed.  This isn't a problem for someone learning the device, but could be aggravating for a more experienced user.  The price was good, the camera's good; overall, we're very pleased with our purchase.

Reviews.Title: Kodak is always the way to go...
Reviews.Author: H. Rudisill "Heather M. R."
Reviews.Content: This is my  3rd kodak digital camera.  The previous two I broke, the first just went everywhere with me (a million camping trips etc...) and it finally died.  The second I dropped in walmart and shattered the screen.  In any event this one has more mega pixels and a better zoom!  It does however take a long time to snap back to back photos.  There is a delay, probably a good 5 seconds.  Aside from that it is great!

Reviews.Title: First Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: Terrance Williams
Reviews.Content: For a first camera I wanted something that was fairly simple and cheap.  My chief interest is in exchanging pictures online with my family.  Getting the Kodak brand was a definite plus in my book.  Actually this camera has surpassed my expectations.  It actually has more capabilities and in addition is easier to use than I expected.  Like anything in the real world, there is a learning curve, but nothing deep, dark and intimidating.

Reviews.Title: Very Easy to Use, But...
Reviews.Author: David T. Williams
Reviews.Content: ... make sure you use the right setting.  I took pictures indoors with the normal setting, and everything came out darker than I remember the room actually being.  If you're indoors in average/fairly bright lighting, I suggest using the low-light setting.Other than that, I'm quite pleased.  The product performed as advertised.  Easy to use, good pictures, 7mp (good for printing) ... I like it, and the price was right.Just be more alert than I was.

Reviews.Title: The Kodak camera is
Reviews.Author: The Statt Family
Reviews.Content: The Kodak cmaera is a good camera, and I have been pleased with it for the most part. The high ISO setting worked well for pictures in low light, but the quality of the pictures was sadly poor. The HD picture quality was stunning, although the files are larger than I like (1 mb or so at 7 megapixels on JPEG). I have a 1 GB memory card that can hold 899 pictures at 7 megapixels. Overall, I have been pleased. I have made a few 8x10's with it, and am pleased with the quality. I take pictures in demanding  settings, but I don't like to use an ISO higher than 100 because of poor quality. The focusing is fair, although it doesn't focus in low light. You can only change the ISO settings in "auto" and "macro" mode. I also frequently use the "night landscape" mode for taking pictures after sunset. Overall, I have been pleased, but there are better cameras out there. Try the Olympus FE-330 first.

Reviews.Title: better than what it replaced.
Reviews.Author: Happy in AZ
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera as a replacement for my other sony cybershot and like it better. It is more user friendly and takes pics faster and easier.

Reviews.Title: Kodak
Reviews.Author: O "has the most music"
Reviews.Content: Kodak is the only brand that I buy cameras from. They take great quality pictures, and I myself have even taken some of the best pictures I've ever seen on this very camera! It's very clear and simple to use, extremely easy to sync with the computer. Also very durable, as I don't have a case for it and I take it everywhere. Basically the best camera ever!

Reviews.Title: good buy for the money
Reviews.Author: Tanya R. Tillett "cosmopolitan, cool"
Reviews.Content: So far, I have been very pleased with this camera.  It's very user friendly -- anyone can just point and shoot it.  It's lightweight, which makes it easy to carry when you're traveling.  If what you're looking for is a simple digital camera that delivers nice photos easily, then this would be a good buy.

Reviews.Title: Surprising
Reviews.Author: Michelle Bailey
Reviews.Content: I was surprised that this camera works as well as it does.  I wasn't sure at first but once I took some pictures of my youngest son I was hooked.  You can't beat it for the price.

Reviews.Title: I miss my Canon...
Reviews.Author: A Reader
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera to replace the Canon SD100 that I lost. I wish I could tell you what kind of pictures it takes, but I can't even get the thing to turn out, straight out of the box. Both the batteries that came with it, and my AA in the house, do not work.The battery cover is extremely tricky to get in place as well, and I was afraid I was going to break it just in my trying to replace the batteries several times.

Reviews.Title: perfect
Reviews.Author: Arzanna Ward
Reviews.Content: inexpensive, easy to use.  perfect for someone who is not a photographer but LOVES taking pictures to create wonderful memories!!

Reviews.Title: Sewing Freak
Reviews.Author: Franhp
Reviews.Content: I love this camera.  It is so easy to use.  I had no instruction book and was able to operate the camera with virtually no questions.  It has some small scratches on it the seller noted but this camera performs like new.  I have posted many pictures on myspace with this camera.  Will be using it to sell Ebay items too.  Kodak did a wonderful job creating this camera.  It is very user friendly.

Reviews.Title: My husband bought it for me when I didn't ask for a camera
Reviews.Author: SMJ "smj"
Reviews.Content: It was a x-mas gift.  He thought he would get a new digital camera b/c the Sony cybershot is 8 years old, and is bigger/bulkier than newer cameras.  I didn't ask for a new camera.  The one I have works fine, and actually works better than this smaller Kodak; it has been dropped and hasn't broken on me yet.  The cybershot also takes better pictures from a distance than the Kodak (note it has more megapixels than my cybershot 2.1).  I also like the sony's batteries as they are easier to replace (AA vs. the square one made for Kodak that I can't seem to charge).  It's cute and easy, but the quality is less than desireable.  Great for a teenager or younger person who is not serious about photography; I happen to like taking pictures that look good!  For the price, not bad; but not great either.

Reviews.Title: poor quality- will not power up!
Reviews.Author: Danny M. Walden
Reviews.Content: The first one lasted about 3 days and then it would not come on. I returned it (thanks to amazon's great return policy) and reordered the same model (C713-pink). The second one lasted about 5 days with the same problem. I suspect some design flaw and will not order another. I have had good luck in the past with other Kodak cameras, but this model seems to have quality issues. I was pleased with the quality of the pictures, what few I was able to take.

Reviews.Title: Easyshare
Reviews.Author: L Atkins
Reviews.Content: My daughter loves her camera.  She had one just like it which was stolen.  She wanted another because it was so easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Easy
Reviews.Author: Emma Melone
Reviews.Content: Easy to use. Super easy to plug into your computer and upload pictures. Batteries do not last long though. Without a memory card it only holds about 14 pictures.

Reviews.Title: great camera, too bad it was discountinued
Reviews.Author: G. Camacho
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera. I had it for years and used it everyday for my job, taking more than 70 pictures per day. I tried the newer model but the quality of the pictures was not the same, That is why I tried to get the same like the old one.  I love it and I it is bad that Kodak discountinueded .

Reviews.Title: Kodak Easy Share
Reviews.Author: Pentax  Family
Reviews.Content: This is our second Kodak Easyshare camera, since we already have the Easyshare program disk, everything is already set up on our computer. Moving pictures to existing files is a breeze.It takes great pictures and is very user friendly.Kodak quality - hard to beat.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: debbie redden "dred"
Reviews.Content: Very Easy to use and great pictures. You will need a memory card for pictures. This my second camera like this.

Reviews.Title: Great Seller
Reviews.Author: millertime1029
Reviews.Content: I love this camera model, and was thrilled to find a used one. When it arrived, it did not take the quality photos I had expected, and the seller immediately responded to my email request to return it, no problem.I highly recommend this seller.

Reviews.Title: Argh!
Reviews.Author: Sara Bear
Reviews.Content: When I first got this camera for Christmas in 2007, I loved it. It was my first digital camera, was easy to figure out, and took pictures. The software it came with caused me a lot of grief, so I just inserted my SD card directly into my computer to get the pictures. It suited my needs pretty well and continued to do so over the years until 2010. It suddenly started eating batteries like crazy. It got to the point where fresh batteries would only last a day. Huge waste of money, so I just replaced it with a Canon PowerShot. I realize I could have just gotten rechargeable batteries, but I was ready to upgrade from 7 megapixels to 10 anyway.I would recommend this to someone who wants a really easy camera to figure out, or to someone who very rarely takes pictures. If you want a camera to take with you anywhere, get something less bulky and higher quality.

Reviews.Title: Fabulous!
Reviews.Author: J. Crookston "Carpe diem"
Reviews.Content: I lost my camera that was identical to to this used one that I purchased.  It works perfectly and was a great value!

Reviews.Title: well pleased
Reviews.Author: iris "garden gal"
Reviews.Content: I owned one of these and loved it. Accidentally broke a part and searched for replacement.  This camera suits my purpose (quick set up for unplanned shots in nature)...picture a little old lady running for a camera to get a shot of a pair of lubber grasshoppers 'caught in the act.'I was extremely happy with the seller.  Received the camera, with batteries, a 28 MB card, and carrying case...more than you ever get with a new 'store bought' one.  Camera is in "like new" condition, as stated.I am very pleased with this purchase.  Thanks much.

Reviews.Title: Camera works great
Reviews.Author: Mark W "Mark"
Reviews.Content: Bought a pair of these for my kids, as they always seem to have some project or another that needs photos.  My youngest is 9 and she figured out the interface with very little help, just a quick run down.  She then experimented with it quite a bit and has used most of the features.  The photos they take though sometimes of questionable content, are comparable to the photos taken with our Cannon Power Shot SX110 IS.  We are not professional users and take volume of pictures more than quality, just trying to capture life as we go.  These cameras work well for this job.Interfacing with the computer was straight forward on Windows XP, and with Windows 7 I just use the OS's interface to pull photos onto the machine.

Reviews.Title: Good for techno challenged
Reviews.Author: Gabesdaddee "Spikemarley"
Reviews.Content: Got this for father in-law who is techno-challenged.  Good choice!  He prints on his own now without me.

Reviews.Title: All you need!
Reviews.Author: Momma Wheats
Reviews.Content: My daughters camera broke a few days after Christmas, so this wasn't the right time to get an expensive digital camera even though she uses it all the time. I found this one for only $70 and was worried because a review said it didn't work right from the box. And either did her's until she put the batteries in 4 different times!We still don't know what was wrong but it has been almost a year and is still working great and takes great pictures! She did say that the battery doesn't want to keep a long charge lately but that could just be because Christmas is coming and the only thing this camera could use are a few more features. But it's been a great buy all in all!

Reviews.Title: Great Value
Reviews.Author: Texan
Reviews.Content: I gave this to my 7 year old grandson.  He uses it.  The pictures are excellent.  The camera is sturdy.

Reviews.Title: Great for a first time digital camera user
Reviews.Author: E. Ellner
Reviews.Content: This was for a technically challenged user. She read the instructions and within 10 minutes was taking pictures, erasing pictures, etc.  I was really amazed.  The quality of the pictures was amazing! I am so happy that I started my sister off on the road to the 21st century.

Reviews.Title: camera
Reviews.Author: P. Gebauer
Reviews.Content: recieved for a christmas gift. quality is good only problem is every time we turn it on it does'nt! seems you have to mess with the battery compartment,like opening and closing it.possible short somewhere maybe! otherwise good camera for the price.

Reviews.Title: Kodak EasyShare C713 7MP Digital Camera w/ video
Reviews.Author: Fiber Mage "is a spinning fanatic"
Reviews.Content: Awesome camera! It allows you to take still shots from videos!!!! The best camera I've owned in a long time! Very super easy to use! Uses normal, easy to find batteries!

Reviews.Title: Solid basic digital camera
Reviews.Author: Jeffrey W
Reviews.Content: We gave this to our 8 year old daughter for Xmas to replace her EasyShare 330. It has many features and a very sharp large LCD screen. I'd gladly use this as my personal digital camera or in my work where I shoot photodocumentation of preschoolers.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera for novice
Reviews.Author: A. MASSEY "JUDY"
Reviews.Content: This was a gift for my Grand daughter.  I have one and her mother has one and they are the perfect camera for every day use for ages 8-80.  I bought rechargable batteries and a charger and I have used  the same batteries for about 2 years and they are still totally functional.  My pictures are great and fun.  It comes with Kodak Easy Share editing program that is good.

Reviews.Title: the best purchase of all
Reviews.Author: Eldon Taylor "online consumer"
Reviews.Content: I travel around I love taking picture this product is amazing in its capabilities to help me with taking pictures that are high quality at any environment I wish and almost any condition - I recommend it highly it is very easy to operate even for the less pro photographers.More then that short search on the net will grant you full tech support from Kodak in case you choose to by used one and with all the accessories you might missed.

Reviews.Title: kodak digital camera
Reviews.Author: Lisa M. Szeto
Reviews.Content: The camera is great. We purchased it for our 9 year old son, because of the price and his love for taking pictures. Deleting bad photos is a great plus. The only problem we had was inserting the batteries. The inside for positive and negative were backwards, however, the cover for the batteries was correct.

Reviews.Title: Kodak Easy Share
Reviews.Author: Martha Star "Star"
Reviews.Content: Gave this to a family member for Christmas. Great little camera and lives up to the name "Easy". Highly recommend!

Reviews.Title: great buy.
Reviews.Author: Shonette Greene "Shonny"
Reviews.Content: loved my cam and it was shipped very fast got it just in time for xmas.

Reviews.Title: Great first digital camera
Reviews.Author: Gadget Geek "David"
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my mother as a Christmas gift; it takes really good pictures, very easy to operate; my mom is 67 years old and doesn't own much up to date electronics because of complexity issues; she loves this camera because of it's simplicity and has opened up to trying more new gadgets now (an ipod touch has her eye now).....Again; Amazon Prime was a great value for me; shipment arrived x-mas eve right on target.....

Reviews.Title: effin awesome camera
Reviews.Author: Linda A. Babcock
Reviews.Content: this is the best camera EVAH it has alot of features and works on my mac LUVS IT SO MUCHpro'sway to many to nameconsthere is no speaker on the camera but it works amazingly on the computer and on my nintendo revolution (wii)over allthe best camera ever GET IT and you will be amazed

Reviews.Title: user friendly post modern imagery
Reviews.Author: Bruce A. Attfield
Reviews.Content: Wow, comparative to the old wet chemistry of dark room dexterity the digital photo now is oh so remarkable. printing the content of storage is nice and easy. Cropping the photo to suit your special needs would take some fiddling with Adobe and that now has been the crux of expertise in software usage. IG; storage, transfer and tweak so as to maximize the photo shop features--alias the camera is only as good as the user so learn well.

Reviews.Title: Good Combination
Reviews.Author: RLG
Reviews.Content: This camera and software are good for novice digital photographers. Purchased for my wife who wants point and shoot capability with little fuss. This fills the bill. Very pleased with the purchase.

Reviews.Title: digital camera
Reviews.Author: J. Troxell
Reviews.Content: I love this camera and what a deal compared to other places.I  always know I can count on Amazon for giving me a great product and I have never had to return anything. I am now able to share all of my Christmas pictures with family all over the United States. Kodak EasyShare V1003 10MP Digital Camera with 3x Optical Zoom (Slate Gray)

Reviews.Title: Good for the money
Reviews.Author: K. Kieffer
Reviews.Content: I like the ease of use of this camera and the price was just right.The batteries don't seem to last long though.  Good quality pictures.Delay between pressing the button and shutter speed.

Reviews.Title: Not to hot
Reviews.Author: Scottie A. Brown
Reviews.Content: The features are nice, great outdoor pics but if u want to take photos inside try somethings else. Not the best quality photos, mine come out fuzzy and the color is dull even with the flash and setting the iso on high. If you want this for only outdoor then its fine indoors not so good.

Reviews.Title: Camera Stopped working
Reviews.Author: Steve Lee
Reviews.Content: Had the camera 6 months; It stopped working all together.Would NOT Recommend this Kodak product.Kodak makes great Paper for cameras... Not Cameras; PleaseBeware.

Reviews.Title: Another lemon!
Reviews.Author: D. Browne
Reviews.Content: So far, two cameras of this model have frozen on me.  Quite worthless!  DO NOT BUY if you want a reliable camera!

Reviews.Title: Great Little Camera
Reviews.Author: V. Haris "Cambug"
Reviews.Content: I love this compact little camera with all the great features I was looking for.  I would recomend it highly.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: Cheryl G. "shears2"
Reviews.Content: I just love this camera! I needed something that was simple yet a camera that takes clear crisp photos and I was pleasantly surprised! It so far has been wonderful.... I had another brand digital before and it was very complicated to use and much more expensive so the simpler the better for my photo taking prompted me to buy this one. I trusted the reviews on this Kodak and I would also recommend this for anyone!!!

Reviews.Title: This is a great camera!
Reviews.Author: CarmelaCox
Reviews.Content: This is my very first digital camera. I bought it both for personal photos and to take shots of items I sell on eBay. It is very easy to use, and I had no problem finding my way around the different functions.

Reviews.Title: Mom's Kodak Easy Share C-713
Reviews.Author: BSN
Reviews.Content: We got this for my mom for Christmas.  She's not used it yet - but based on my experience with my Kodak Easy Share CX7430 I'm sure she'll enjoy it.  For years she's used disposable cameras -- the result was that she would often take duplicate shots to be sure she got a picture she wanted.  I know she'll enjoy being able to review a shot on her new Easy Share, to know in advance she'll be satisfied with the picture she's taken.  She now has a great way to capture memories of her 3-year old great granddaughter's antics.

Reviews.Title: New Camera for Daughter
Reviews.Author: Sandra O'Regan "Sandi O'Regan"
Reviews.Content: I got this camera for my daughter.  She had an older Kodak that I gave to her when I bought myself a new one.  It finally bit the dust. She is a new mommy (and I am a new grandma!) so she needed a camera to get those precious snaps of the baby.  It is a great camera and the price was right!

Reviews.Title: A Piece of Unworthy Trash
Reviews.Author: Mattiene A. Moustakas
Reviews.Content: I thought Kodak had maintained  high standards, despite my mistake in vowing never to buy a Chinese mainland made camera. Keep that up Kodak, and you will be killing off the venerable Kodak name once and forever.I bought this little camera, and when it arrived, it didn't work, or even turn on! I was told to send it, in its original box, to the contracted service center. I got it back in pieces: the original package was gone, and in its place were what appeared to be left-over parts from other dissatisfied and gullible customers. It still didn't take quality pictures,mostly out of focus and distorted. Now here's the real problem. Amazon return policy states to return it in the original box or package, which the service center did not return.There is no number to call to complain about this shoddy treatment, so my only recourse is to BOYCOTT AMAZON, after having bill a loyal customer since Amazon's inception. I SURE HELP SOMEONE READS THIS IN CUSTOMER SERVICE, AND CALLS ME, WHILE I CONTINUE TO CONDEMN IN UNPROFESSIONAL SERVICES RENDERED.Mattiene Moustakas.......phone: 315.383.3196Let's see if they even care.WELL, HERE WE GO AGAIN...NOW THIS CHEAP COMMUNIST CHINESE PRODUCT IT NOT FLASH IN ANY SETTING, SO IT BACK TO THAT HORRIBLE RECOMMENDED REPAIR CENTER, UNITED CAMERA AND BINOCULAR REPAIR IN ILLINOIS. I DON'T EXPECT RESULTS, AND MAY AGAIN GET ANOTHER DIRTY REPLACEMENT. DON'T SEND IT THERE, EVEN IF IT IS STILL WARRANTEED...........

ProductInfo.Features:
7-megapixel resolution for stunning prints up to 20 x 30 inches
3x optical zoom lens, 5x digital zoom; HD still capture and VGA video
2.4-inch indoor/outdoor color LCD
Digital image stabilization reduces blur
Compatible with SD/SDHC memory cards (not included)
ProductInfo.Name: Kodak Easyshare C713 7 MP Digital Camera with 3xOptical Zoom
